comment.author: 53461717@N08
comment._content:
The "pigs" are leather wine-bags (odre) or boots (bota in Spain).  In Mexico these bags are used to transport or store  the pulque.  The pulque (poolke) is an ethilic beverage obtained by the fermentation of the maguey (agave) sap.   The saloons where this drink is sold is called pulquería (poolkereea).
Dr. Roberto Duarte
